data.name: Soul Symphony
data.detailed_description:
A Trippy Physics Based RPG. Make your way around a maze and try to figure out what is happening between different NPCs as they tell you things based on an Eastern Philisophy known as Ling. This game features strobing colors and lights and those sensitive to epileptic seizures should not play this game.



Included in Package: Basic HUB Levels of Soul Symphony, NPCS, and dialog. Content Randomizes each time the game is started or you go through portals. Talk to all the NPCs and learn the story "in-between".

data.short_description: A Trippy Physics Based RPG. Make your way around a maze and try to figure out what is happening between different NPCs as they tell you things based on an Eastern Philisophy known as Ling.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, ViSTA, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.8GHz / AMD Athlon 64 4000+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 2 GB RAM, OpenGL 4.3
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, ViSTA, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.8GHz / AMD Athlon 64 4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 8GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL

  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.8GHz / AMD Athlon 64 4000+

  • Graphics: Graphics card with 2 GB RAM, OpenGL 4.3
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.8GHz / AMD Athlon 64 4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 8GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 3.x

  • Graphics: Graphics card with 2 GB RAM, OpenGL 4.3
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 8GB
